reviews.text:
Great food and it‚Äôs all super fresh.  They even have a different menu based on the day of the week.  The owner Georgina knows everyone‚Äôs name who comes in and is so nice.  Really a great neighborhood spot.
I got a huge portion and a glass of wine for $22

Ordered out great food

While the food is very good, when I go in there to get my order the price is normal, but when my African American boyfriend goes in there to pick up food the prices are higher. Doesn't make sense. It's very distasteful so we just stopped ordering from them.
Very good food at this place.

Such a great place with great deals for a good meal. To feed a family of 5 you don‚Äôt need a lot from here a combo plate and another side dish and you‚Äôre golden. They give you a giant plate of rice with beans, the sides more than enough to share. Parking is tough but if you‚Äôre walking around the Bronx hit this place up.
i went with a friend the food was delicious

Conoc√≠ este restaurante por casualidad pero siempre que puedo voy, a pesar de que me queda lejos y la raz√≥n es porque la comida es muy buena y las se√±oras que atienden son muy amables, eso es un tesoro dif√≠cil de encontrar. Prueben el chicharr√≥n de cerdo y el delicioso mojito que hacen aqu√≠, no se arrepentir√°n.
Excelent

It's a good restaurant, but there's a lot of people standing in-front of the barber-shop next door which makes it feel ghetto and weird.. like I'm in a bad (wrong) place... & they look at you like they have a problem with you (I don't know these people).

It makes me uncomfortable to go inside the restaurant, but the food was good! Shame.

Es un buen restaurante, pero hay mucha gente parada frente a la barber√≠a de al lado, lo que lo hace sentir como un gueto y extra√±o... como si estuviera en un mal (equivocado) lugar... y te miran. como si tuvieran un problema contigo (no conozco a estas personas).

Me resulta inc√≥modo entrar al restaurante, ¬°pero la comida estaba buena! L√°stima.
Sabrosa comida,  Muy acojedor
I love this place. I come here so much I even know the cook üòÖ.. The Owners are husband and wife They give a good vibe to all the customers and Make everyone feel at home.

Delicious Dominican food where you can get a lot of food for your money here and customer service is very kind. I ordered oven roasted chicken, moro (rice mixed with beans) and stewed beans. If you‚Äôre hungry and in the area, buy yourself a meal here üòä
Thank you my love for warming this nurses soul with your food!
I always love stopping here when I'm in the neighborhood. The food is really delicious and you get a good amount for your money. The service is outstanding and always with a beautiful smile.
Good food and good customer service.
Se come divino y ante todo ordenado e higi√©nico
Good food
Rica la comida
Got food delivered and they gave me the wrong food I called back asked for a refund and they said they can‚Äôt give me a refund while yelling at me
They have very poor service
The best food I've ever tasted. The service is great. I love there food. Everything is amazing
I buy bbq ribs and the brown rice and beans every time i go there. It‚Äôs bussin. idk bout the other stuff but that..

Great place!

Authentic Latin Caribbean cuisine. Mom and pop diner type restaurant so they put care into their food preperation.‚Ä¶
Delicious food
2/26/22. Rice/ beans/chicken/chuleta combo. Excellent. El sabor lo dice todo!  El pernil necesita m√°s sabor y el corte m√°s finito. Pero, se deja comer. ü§ó

Excellent. Just a little loud on the music but food taste really homemade.
Great food üëå‚Ä¶
Un lugar muy acogedor y familia, con buena comida, cervezas frias y buenos  precios. Estrategicamente ubicado cerca de trenes 4,5,y6 y de parada de buses 11,19,35,y 4
Food is good, affordable, and quick service.

We were near this place and hesitated to go in but do not regret. Great service from Dolys and the entire staff. A family friendly service and an awesome homemade food. We ate a grilled steak with onions, white rice, red beans, avocado Salads and some Tostones. Everything was great.
Great Service!!! I have my fresh chicken soup, or pea soup (Ganudules) on Thursdays.  So far everything has been Great, I've been there daily for breakfast the last 5 weeks.

I like the food at this location, but they are a bit "standoffish" when it comes to customers of other races. Definitely a "delay" in service. The only other thing is that they only have yellow rice before 3pm. You cant get it after (they sell out quick).

I gave it two stars based on the fact that I've been here before with less headaches. Food is good. Service is less than satisfactory. Maybe if they turned down the music they could get an order right.

The price is certainly good for the area, I'll probably consider coming by again. As per usual, it is hard to find a place with a veggie banh mi that I can add egg to but those are few and far between really. This will probably become one of the go tos if I stay here longer.
Good food and service. Friendly staff and an extensive  (local) menu.  Decor basic but clean. Very good value for money.  Appears to be the hub of local interaction.
The food is delicious & well season the people are very nice there and the price is excellent
The food is soo delicious! I love how they cook the pollo guisado. Friendly staff and very nice ambient.
My order took long but the food was good. I had fried whiting fish.. White rice & pink beans.
Fast and good services, great food. Better prices then El Valle and food always arrived hot.

Food is always great here!

Catering options are great! Great prices. Andres always hooks it up!
Literally the best Neighborhood Dominican and Puerto Rican cuisine, the food is always fresh and good and fairly priced
The service was excellent....The food was also good....well seasoned and cooked
Good food,I highly recommend this place, the price of a nice plate to go is $6...
La comida es muy rica pero el personal que atiende nunca tiene buena actitud .
Food was amazing. Friendly service and quick
Love there food not to many good Spanish food restaurant has been there for a long time food is good.they have tables for eating in
Great food... nice environment
Great food, it's been a long time
Food was good porkchop a little 2 salty but otherwise ok
The service is amazing you always feel welcome and the food is amazing
food is very good fast service and inexpensive
I will not go back here. There was a cucaracha (roach) in my arroz con pollo.
